name: Square? (Blazer)
description:
You have one goal - get to the end, to get the valuable reward.

The game was inspired by a popular rage game -  Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy

You need to get to the top of the level avoiding 75 obstacles on your way, for the great reward that is waiting on the top, but you need to be calm and patient since this game isn't so easy! Remember you can't give up!
